mapper.insert: insert into singo(singo_writer, singo_reason, singo_content, singo_date, singo_image, singo_pisingoja) values(#{singoWriter}, #{singoReason}, #{singoContent}, now(), #{singoImage}, #{singoPisingoja})
mapper.select: select member_name from member where member_id = #{memberId}
mapper.update: update member set member_warning = member_warning + 1 where member_id = #{memberId}
mapper.select: select * from member right outer join singo on member_id = singo_pisingoja
